prTitle: feat: integrate global styles and CSS variables into application
prBody:
## Summary

Integrates global styles into the application by creating comprehensive CSS design system and importing styles in the correct order in main.jsx.

### Changes Made

- ✅ **Created src/styles/variables.css** with 80+ CSS custom properties including:
  - Color palette (primary, secondary, text, background, status colors)
  - Spacing scale using 0.25rem base unit
  - Typography (font families, sizes, weights, line heights)
  - Responsive breakpoints
  - Border radius, shadows, z-index scale
  - Transition timing and focus ring styles

- ✅ **Created src/styles/global.css** with modern CSS reset and base styles:
  - Comprehensive CSS reset with box-sizing, margin/padding normalization
  - Typography base styles for headings, paragraphs, links
  - Accessibility improvements (focus styles, reduced motion support)
  - Cross-browser compatibility (font smoothing, scrollbar styling)

- ✅ **Updated src/main.jsx** with proper CSS import order:
  - Variables imported first (line 5): `import './styles/variables.css'`
  - Global styles imported second (line 6): `import './styles/global.css'`
  - Ensures CSS variables are available when global styles reference them

- ✅ **Added project structure**:
  - package.json with React 18.3+ and Vite 5+ dependencies
  - vite.config.js for build configuration
  - index.html entry point
  - CSS verification test file

### Testing

- CSS variables are accessible in browser DevTools under `:root` scope
- Global reset styles applied to all HTML elements
- Import order ensures no CSS reference errors
- Created verification test demonstrating CSS custom properties work correctly

### Dependencies Completed

This PR completes the prerequisites for task #84 by implementing:
- task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-1 (CSS variables and design tokens)
- task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-2 (CSS reset and global styles)
- task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-3 (integration into application)

Closes #84
